name: UKG
description: UKG is a company that provides HR service delivery software, HCM and workforce management solutions. They help organizations of all sizes to find better solutions that inspire their people and elevate the workplace experience. UKG offers time and attendance solutions, which include time, attendance, and scheduling. They also provide HR service delivery software and HCM solutions that inspire your people and elevate the work experience.
Headline: Your better tomorrow starts today

Highlights.name: UKG Pro - Providing a culture-driven HCM solution that inspires your people
Highlights.description: UKG Pro® is a powerful HCM suite for midsized to large organizations with over 500 employees looking to drive people-focused business results.

Highlights.name: UKG Ready - Purposeful HR that guides and empowers leaner teams
Highlights.description: UKG Ready® is an all-in-one HR and payroll software for small to midsized businesses with less than 500 employees looking to increase efficiency and simplify compliance.

Highlights.name: UKG Bryte - Make your workplace shine brighter with UKG AI
Highlights.description: Building on our history with AI in the workplace, UKG Bryte shines a light on your data to illuminate the best path forward on your journey to creating a great workplace. It’s AI at work — and in service of all people.

enhanced_description: UKG provides comprehensive HR service delivery, HCM, and workforce management solutions designed to inspire people and elevate the workplace experience for organizations across various sizes. Their offerings include core HR, payroll, time and attendance, scheduling, and talent management capabilities. UKG Pro is a powerful, culture-driven HCM suite specifically tailored for midsized to large organizations with over 500 employees, focusing on driving people-focused business results. UKG Ready is an all-in-one HR and payroll software designed for small to midsized businesses with less than 500 employees, aiming to increase efficiency and simplify compliance. Additionally, UKG leverages artificial intelligence through UKG Bryte to provide data insights and illuminate optimal paths for creating a great workplace.
key_use_cases: Supporting Talent Management (e.g., performance, career, recognition)
Gaining AI-powered insights from HR data
competitive_advantages: Offers tailored HCM solutions for diverse company sizes (UKG Pro for large, UKG Ready for small/mid)
Focus on culture-driven HCM and elevating workplace experience
Provides an all-in-one HR and payroll software for small to midsized businesses, emphasizing efficiency and compliance
Utilizes AI (UKG Bryte) for data illumination and strategic guidance
Strong emphasis on employee inspiration and engagement
roi_benefits: Increased operational efficiency in HR and payroll
Data-driven insights for strategic HR decisions
Ability to drive people-focused business results
scalability_features: Designed to serve organizations from small businesses to large enterprises through distinct product offerings (UKG Ready for small to midsized, UKG Pro for midsized to large)
